hobbies.name: Guitar
hobbies.desc: Writing, playing, and performing on my guitar is one of my favorite ways to spend my time. My favorite artists to play are John Mayer, City & Color, and Death Cab for Cutie.

hobbies.name: Snowboarding
hobbies.desc: I always hated winters in Utah...until I started snowboarding. I love the freeing feeling of carving my way down an empty mountain with a couple of friends.

hobbies.name: Netflix
hobbies.desc: Sometimes I think I should become a professional Netflix viewer. My wife and I love curling up with a big bowl of popcorn and an entire season of a good TV show.

hobbies.name: Eating
hobbies.desc: Eating food is probably the most dangerous of my hobbies. It's pretty hard to keep me away from a smothered burrito from La Puente or a good ol' milkshake and order of cheese fries from Leatherby's.

hobbies.name: Family Time
hobbies.desc: I married my best friend on September 10, 2014. We got a wonderful cocker spaniel named Mosby soon after. My favorite part of the day is coming home from work/school to see their beautiful faces.
